Catalina 22, 1986, Swing Keel

1986 üìç Lake Lewisville, Denton, Texas SOLD
$5,225

This well-maintained Catalina 22 swing keel was always kept in fresh water and features numerous upgrades from 2007-2010.

Recent Updates

  • Bottom job completed August 2010
  • Slip available - you can take over the current slip
  • Always stored in fresh water

Included Equipment

The boat comes with a comprehensive sail inventory including a full batten main (2007), 135% genoa (2005), 150% genoa, and a spinnaker.

The 2003 Tohatsu 4 HP 4-stroke outboard motor is included, as well as all canvas covers and a clean, never-used porta potti.

This boat has been sold. Browse our other sailboats for sale or post your own ad.

Features & Equipment

  • Full batten main 2007
  • 135 genoa 2005
  • 150 genoa
  • Spinnaker
  • New tiller and cover 2007
  • New sail cover 2007
  • New battery 2007
  • Boomkicker and jib downhaul 2010
  • Vinyl enclosure for pop top
  • Porta potti (clean-never used)
  • 2003 Tohatsu 4 HP 4-stroke
